info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 29 at 10:35AM CDT until August 29 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 AM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN ROCK ISLAND AND NORTHWESTERN MERCER COUNTIES... At 1034 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Illinois City to near Northfield, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Aledo, Millersburg, New Boston, Reynolds, Eliza, Joy, Hamlet, Mannon, Aledo Mercer County Airport, Gingle Corners, Petersville, Marston and Mercer County Fairgrounds. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
